price: “Maze mumusuke amazi yatuye mu mutwe nk’igihano.”
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
